The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 December is 1,452,137 (2,579.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 November, there were 86,391 new confirmed cases (153.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 November, there were 113,059 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 24% (26,668 fewer cases).
